item.title: Update doprax
item.description: https://www.doprax.com - â€” Cloud hosting for your Apps, Websites and APIs. Free for one app, with 4 * 256MB ram and 2 GB of disk. To create an app space, you need to have at least $3 in your account credit balance.

item.title: Fix typo
item.description: https://nextui.org/ - Free. Beautiful, fast and modern React & Next.js UI library.

item.title: docs: add Zeabur
item.description: https://zeabur.com - Deploy your services with one click. Free for 3 services, with US$ 5 free credits per month.

item.title: Fix formatting for Vercel.
item.description: https://vercel.com/ - Build, deploy, and host web apps with free SSL, global CDN, and unique Preview URLs each time you `git push`. Perfect for Next.js and other Static Site Generators.

item.title: Fix typo in README.md
item.description: https://befonts.com/ - Provides several unique fonts for personal or commercial use.

item.title: added Cosmonic WebAssembly PaaS to README
item.description: https://cosmonic.com - Feature rich WebAssembly PaaS and SDKs for low boilerplate, flexible, and secure by default microservices. Always free tier includes a managed host, 25 microservices, and included capabilities like a robust keyvalue store, load balanced public HTTP endpoints, and more.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description:
https://www.gather.town/ - A better way to meet online. Centered around fully customizable spaces, Gather makes spending time with your communities just as easy as real life. Free for up to 10 concurrent users.
https://home.robusta.dev/ - Powerful Kubernetes monitoring, based on Prometheus. Bring your own Prometheus or install the all-in-one bundle. Free tier includes up to 20 Kubernetes nodes. Alerts via Slack, Microsoft Teams, Discord, and more. Integrations with PagerDuty, OpsGenie, VictorOps, DataDog, and many other tools.
https://axiom.co/ - Store up to 0.5 TB of logs with 30 day retention. Includes integrations with platforms like Vercel and advanced data querying with email/Discord notifiers.
https://www.dronahq.com/ - DronaHQ - a low code platform helps engineering teams and product managers to build internal tools, custom user journeys, digital experiences, automations, custom admin panels, operational apps 10X faster.
https://css.glass/ - Free web app for creating glassmorphic designs using CSS.
https://ipstack.com/ - Locate and identify Website Visitors by IP Address
https://ayedot.com/ - Share your ideas, knowledge and stories with the world for Free, in form of Modern multimedia short-format Miniblogs.
